subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Stephen Gallacher of Scotland shot a 10-under-par 62 to take a three-shot lead at the Dubai Desert Classic and break a three-round scoring record set by Tiger Woods 12 years ago
snippet: Stephen Gallacher of Scotland shot a 10-under-par 62 to take a three-shot lead at the Dubai Desert Classic and break a three-round scoring record set by Tiger Woods 12 years ago
